name: BuddyPress Captcha
author: Hardeep Asrani

sections.description:
This plugin adds Google’s reCAPTCHA form to your BuddyPress’ registration page to keep your community spam-free! You can use out simple option panel to add reCAPTCHA credentials right from your Dashboard without editing any files.

This plugin is a forked version of BuddyPress reCAPTCHA plugin, which requires you to edit plugin core files to configure reCAPTCHA.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory, or download and install automatically through your admin panel.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Configure reCAPTCHA settigns from Settings > BuddyPress Captcha menu.
sections.faq:
How to donate or contribute?

I’m a teen WordPresser, so I don’t have a Paypal account, so just simply support this plugin by visiting our website Tricks Panda.
